name: EAHPIdentifierTypeCS
title: EAHP Identifier Types
description: Custom identifier types for pharmacy automation.

concept.definition: The raw, unparsed data string captured from the package barcode (e.g., GS1 DataMatrix). This string contains the full set of encoded data (GTIN, Lot, Expiry, Serial) including hidden group separators. It is the primary technical key for Falsified Medicines Directive (FMD) verification.
The portion of the barcode identifying the product (e.g. GTIN, PZN).
